title: Scott Adams, whose comic strip ‘Dilbert’ ridiculed white-collar office life, dies at 68
description: His first ex-wife, Shelly Miles, announced the death on a livestream posted on Adams’ social media accounts.
content: His first ex-wife, Shelly Miles, announced the death on a livestream posted on Adams’ social media accounts.
